summary: A corporate lawyer reconsiders his career options after making friends with the staff and regulars at a cocktail lounge called The Foxes Den.
cast: Jackson Rathbone|Jack Holmes|Jocelin Donahue|Elliott Gould|Brian Doyle-Murray|Bob Gunton|Pooch Hall|Caity Lotz|Carly Craig|Mark Famiglietti|Xander Berkeley|Christina Pickles|John H. title: Live at the Foxes Den
